main event: A UFO, described as a flying saucer, landed near Mulberry Corners, Ohio on August 29, 1955, and a man emerged to speak with the witness.
interesting points: The object was round, gold in color, and approximately 30 feet in diameter., The witness reported a green light and a yellow light emitting from the craft., An investigator considered the witness's account credible despite potential psychological influences., The landing site was thoroughly investigated but found no significant physical evidence., The witness was instructed to relay a message to government authorities regarding the extraterrestrial visitors.
sighted object: a flying saucer with a dome and a door
witness description: A 21-year-old male who appeared sincere and cooperative during interviews.
